description: Certain businesses will be allowed to operate from 25 April, the States of Guernsey says.
title: Coronavirus: Some Guernsey firms to reopen from 25 April
title_page: Coronavirus: Some Guernsey firms to reopen from 25 April - BBC News
maintext: Mr St Pier said: "There is no bullet-proof way of moving into this next phase as we seek to relax lockdown measures, so we need businesses and the wider community to continue supporting us to reduce the risk of the number of cases beginning to rise again."
